name: Tim de Vries
note:
нанимает на данный момент людей из Индии и Украины, от Индии хочет отказаться. Их сайт пока на стадии разработки и нужна помощь в плане дизайна и разработки. Отходят от вордпресса, используют в основном React, Python, Sales Force (поискать), Jango/CMS
Скинуть цены и резюме на почту, посоветутеся с партнерами и вернется к нам в конце недели 
Интрвьюировал Влада Пелифосова, он скинул тест, но пока молчат.
Взяли Беликова Владимира с 1 ноября 2019
Service/Product: Digital agency, specializing in design and development
Mostly work with pharma, medical and automotive industries. UI/UX design.

They speak Spanish also. Use a lot of slang people have to use to.
They are working with: React, angular, PHP, Symphony, Javascript. 

Immediate Requirement: developers that have experience in Symphony, WordPress developers

They NEED developers asap!
Additional possible positions: iOS, Android, Back-ends developers, PHP
Alexandr Struzhko: was a teacher in the university, magister of computer science was studying in Russia also, more than 10 years, java, sharp, PHP, c++, angular, FTP, JQuery. Was transferring the project from PHP to WordPress, strong side is PHP.
Denys Molchanov: Has experience in CSS, HTML, JavaScript, WordPress, C, PHP. Denys understands English not well.
Results: Alexandr Struzhko part-time from 12/07/2020
Next step: Tim sent us a test task for developers (Denys Molchanov). And we agreed to keep in touch, to test new developers to meet his requirements (people who can use premium templates and plugins, from scratch, make alternative solutions, thinks of a better way of doing the job)

с 11.11. Вова более не работает на компанию, им нужет человек с большим обытом
Звонок был 04.09. 2019
Нужен еще проджект менеджер, 
the most important part is that they work thoroughly;
- they have to make notes and translate whatever is talked about to tasks
- they have to push designers/developers to get things done without frustrating them or making them upset
- they have to keep client informed and be very pro-active in their communication

3/5/20 переписка в скайпе, спрашивал React Native devs, планируют завершить работы по сайту в течение 2 недель и потом заняться маркетингом, готов рассмотреть лидогенерацию через 2 недели

Fresh results : Our company is currently working with the client.(25.01.2021)

FRESH RESULT

We have interviewed Svetlana for TEQQED company.

Svetlana https://rh-s.com/marketer/lead-generation-managers/svetlana-t/

Working in RH for 2 years. She has experience in Digital Marketing, with organizing work. She is interested in being a project manager. Also she worked as a freelancer - translator. Like to discover new things, especially in the IT sphere. 


Tim wants to try to work with Svitlana - FullTime. We need to connect Iryna and Svitlana. Ira should introduce tasks for Svitlana. Agreement starts on Tuesday (01/06). Set up an Introductory call on Monday (31/05). Price: first two month - 800EUR, after two month - 1000EUR. 

We need to create a chat with Tim, Svitlana and Iryna on Skype.

name: Luc Allemand
note:
Company: RNW Media

Company website: https://www.rnw.org/

Country: Netherlands 

Client: Luc Allemand

Service/Product: RNW Media is a center of expertise that builds digital communities for social change. They build digital communities for social change and create online platforms for which they design content, engagement, and moderation strategies.

Immediate Requirement: Back and front-end developers, (HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Wordpess, Drupal)

Additional possible positions: people with .NET, and knowledge of Azure or AWS.
The project is to add "Services & Functions" to an APP (Financial and Access to farming Market).

Next step: Send a sample of the SA, our web-site, presentation. The client will contact us when knowing the exact date of starting his project.

We made a quick call with Luc Allemand from RNW Media company.

He shortly described their needs to design a wireframe, Design, and Develop this project.
Also said that he shared with us a job description via email.
We scheduled an interview for 16th of August at 12 PM (his time).

name: Henrik Maehle
note:
"can you please send me a cv?"
Company Name: TechHub

Website: https://www.techub.no/  
 We interviewed candidates for the web-designer position.
Olha   https://rh-s.com/designers/olha-k/ has experience in Ukrsibbank as a personal financial consultant for about a year. Now, she is a designer in Remote Helpers. And she uses Figma and Photoshop and Illustrator for create designs for a different company. And she have a few work for example landing pages, mobile Apps. 

Nikita   https://rh-s.com/designers/nikita-s/   is a designer. He has been working as a designer for 1 year. He created designs such as landing pages, banners, designs for drink, for a sushi restaurant, and he created designs for the online libraries for mobile App. And he has logos for many companies, and it was created by him. 

Victoria https://rh-s.com/designers/viktoriia-k/ is a designer. She created banners for our site. And she has design mobile App and some landing page. She created redesign for the webpage for watch company. 
Tania   https://rh-s.com/designers/tetiana-t/ is a designer. She uses Photoshop, Figma and Illustrator and WordPress Elementor. She created designs for an internet shop, business cards and design landing pages for restaurants and for travel company and she created logo for Instagram and Facebook. 

Diana https://rh-s.com/designers/diana-s/ is a designer in Figma. She has designs for an internet shop, banners, and she created design for the landing pages.

Henrik would like to start with Nikita firstly and tomorrow we will have one more call where we  will discuss future tasks, start date and other administrative questions. 

Contact Person: Henrik Maehle's

Product: TecHub is Managment Consulting company and stands for Technology, Economy and Co-operation. They set out to create a platform where they empower businesses from Nordic Region and Africa. Also company was founded in 2019. They provide their clients with accurate business insights across all the sectors and leverage on  unique recruiting resources by pairing highly skilled, dedicated and tech-savvy candidates to fill the available positions in company.

Target Audience: Business Development companies and clients, who are interested in such services.

Immediate Requirement: Graphic and web designers, WordPress developers, and content managers. They need ASAP

Next Step:I will send the SA and CVs of potential candidates and we set up the next call with them.
We interviewed Nikita and Henrik asked different questions to Nikita after he decided to start with him on 22/01/21. Also, I sent him a contract and he signed it, they communicate in WhatsApp. Nikita received the first task and do it.

name: Michael Krystof
note:
.First call
Сompany Name: TankE GmbH (Renewables & Environment) b2b, 16 employees, Exist 1 year
Contact Person: Michael Krystof
Product: All-inclusive electric mobility charging solutions, consulting service, based in Germany.
Conception, funding advice, hardware selection, construction, maintenance and the design of tailor-made billing models
Country- Location: Cologne (Köln), Germany
Target Audience: Germany based electrical stations, Logistics and Transportation companies, with more then 20 cars, Small markets shops
Immediate Requirement:  German speakers! LG manager, SMM, Content managers (creative people), PPC to increase their visibility, changeable people that can help to rise them,Designers for a short-video creation, presentation, animations and pictures
Additional possible positions: Lead builder, Key account manager. 
Next Step: Interview with a candidates
Next Contact Date: 25, November (Wednesday) at 10.30 PM (9.30 Germany time).
Interview

Designer: 
Yuliia K. (ID 677)- https://rh-s.com/designers/yuliia-k/ 
Graphic and motion designer in the Instagram/Facebook. She also can edit and make a short-video and animations. In work she uses Adobe Photoshop illustrator. Yuliia presented us a short video and animation. Michael asked how many input in her work she needs.

Video editors: 
Yevhen O. (ID 717)- https://rh-s.com/video-editors/yevhen-o-2/ 
Kiev, He has degree in computers and can create video from scratch. Yevhen presented us 2 videos and Motion designer example. Promo for a social media he can do also. Mix of real video +motion.

Nazar K.(ID 716) - https://rh-s.com/video-editors/nazar-k/ 
20 y.o., Zaporozhye. Now he is studying Adobe illustrator. Nazar showed a video made for a taxi service and IT- company, connected to shopifying. The 3d video was about Remote Helpers. Michael liked especially the last one.

Anastasia S.(ID 770) - https://rh-s.com/content-managers/anastasiia-s/ 
25 y.o. She is working as a Lead Generation Manager and knows German on A-2 level.
Michael told that they have 185 followers in LinkedIn and he wants to rise the client's attention. He asked whether she would be able to make a posts in LinkedIn in English and German languages. She answered that she can.

Results:
Michael said he need to talk with his sales managers to choose the best candidate for a video creation (first of all). Follow up in one week, 1st of December. One more candidate (that knows German) may be interviewed for a context creation, if we’ll find so.

Fresh results : Our company is currently have the agreement with the client.(26.01.2021)

name: Steven Toole
note:
learning more about our services

Result:
Company Name: Toole & Associates, LLC


Company Website: http://www.tooleassociates.com


Contact Person: Steven Toole


Product:  They specialize in online reputation management for local businesses, driving a significant increase in 5-star reviews on every major online review site. Their proprietary online reviews generation platform makes it fast and easy for customers to share their positive experience on the largest public online review sites, while giving customers a way to provide negative feedback privately with the business, helping to reduce negative public reviews online.

Specialties:  Online Reputation Management, Reviews Marketing, Google My Business, Yelp, TripAdvisor, and Facebook Reviews


Country-Location: USA


Target Audience: worldwide


Immediate Requirement: Steven is looking for somebody who can do administrative tasks, data entry - Assistant, LG Manager. It is not necessary to work in his time zone. Part Time. 

Next Step: send all information about our company and CV’s with the most suitable candidates. 

Next Contact Date: scheduled next call 30th of June at 6 PM (our time).

name: Jesper Lima Schnor Barros Rasmussen
note:
updated

Сompany Name: IQ Tattoocare ApS, http://iqtattoocare.com/
Contact Person: Jesper Lima Schnor Barros Rasmussen 
Product: The development of the cream, innovative company that hopes to be able to influence the way tattoo enthusiasts nurture their body art, creams for tattoo, B2B
Services Provided: develope, label, market and guide to fullfill private label dream,  developing natural products for a safe and effective healing process without the use of harmful chemicals, selling products to customers
Country-Location: Denmark
Target Audience: worldwide tattoo masters and companies
Immediate Requirement: lead generation manager and SMM manager at the same time ( it could be 2 person for the pert time), someone who has tattoo and is interested in this field.
Next Step: send all information, send cv's of possible candidates, we will organise an interview, he needs people as soon as possible
Next Contact Date: 7 April 15:00 (our time) - interview

Fresh results:
Сompany Name: IQ Tattoocare ApS, http://iqtattoocare.com/
Contact Person: Jesper Lima Schnor Barros Rasmussen 
At first Jesper talked a few words about his product and present it to our candidates. 
We were interviewing:
Maria: She has a friend who is having a website about tattoos, where she is searching for key words and writing articles about tattoos. Also she is an active user of social media networks, she is running an instragram profile about tatoos. Then she talked about her attitude towards tattoos, moreover, it turned out that she is not having any tatoo yet. Jesper asked Maria about her hobbys. They are: travelling and extreme sports (like parachuting, kayaking). Earlier she made Facebook and Instagram ads. Jesper wants to looks at pages Maria is responsible for (instagram pages). She sent links in our chat (https://www.tattoosfolder.com/; https://www.instagram.com/tattooassist?r=nametag).

Lia: She wanted to be a tatoo master, even took a course 1 year ago. She has been working for our clients on 2 different projects, has many tatoos. She is a LG manager. She believes that knows a lot about a promotion and about a target promotion. Jesper explained that mainly communication will be done via email. Jesper needs interested customers and at the same time Instagram and Facebook pages should be updated reguraly (not every single day, but reguraly). Lia is convinced that she is aware what to write in order to have a lot of clients. She also attached a link of her own blog about tattoos (https://www.instagram.com/p/CMT6W16F7up/?igshid=1ha8pj4d4idxi; https://m.facebook.com/fanteamcommunity/?__nodl&ref=external%3Awww.google.com.ua&_rdr).

Andrii: 25 y.o. He is from a content department. What he is doing is a key words researching. Earlier he was working in a tattoo sphere, was working for a company from Brooklyn, they were selling online. He is having a couple tattoos. Jesper asked about social media posts if Andrii was working with that. Andrii can do ads as well (Facebook and Google ads). "How would you target tatoo shops?" Jesper asked. Andrii would apply some Google Ads for their landing page with some catchy messages.

Antonina: 31 y.o. She is a pharmacist. She likes travelling, lived in Thailand last year where worked as a Sales manager. She has one tattoo, a bamboo tattoo. Now she is working as a LG manager for our company. She can find people in different social media networks. She is aware about different kinds of ads, not an expert at that, but she is ready to learn fast.


Jesper was really satisfied with all 4 candidates. He is not sure that Antonina is experienced enough, he prefers Maria to Antonina, because she is more into tattoos and more experienced. Also, Jesper wants to check out links girls sent firstly. And Jesper needs to discuss all it with his partner. 

Next Step: We'll have a call with Jesper and his colleague (probably this Friday). He will inform the exact date in WhatsApp.
